biotools.summary: Multivariate state space model that integrates nucleotide sequence and chromatin accessibility data (currently uses only with MNase-seq or ATAC-seq) to compute genome-wide probabilistic occupancy landscape of nucleosomes and transciption factors (collectively known as DNA-binding factors or DBFs).

bioschemas.name: RoboCOP
bioschemas.summary: Multivariate state space model that integrates nucleotide sequence and chromatin accessibility data (currently uses only with MNase-seq or ATAC-seq) to compute genome-wide probabilistic occupancy landscape of nucleosomes and transciption factors (collectively known as DNA-binding factors or DBFs).
